## Security Checklist
- [ ] CodeQL passes
- [ ] Secret Scan passes
 - [ ] Dependency Review clean (or skipped for private repo without GHAS)

## Lab 1 — Evidence
- [ ] Screenshots added to `docs/LAB1-Deliverables.md`
- [ ] PR “Checks” panel screenshot included
- [ ] Short captions explain each screenshot state (enabled/skipped/no alerts)
